item.title: Weatherford International plc 10-K
item.description: Weatherford International plc, which is in the Oil & Gas Filed Machinery & Equipment [3533] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 08, 2023 had 27506 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 272 instances million - 257 instances 10 - 238 instances 2021 - 232 instances weatherford - 230 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
